newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentine provincial transfers up 17 pct in April.
newsitem.headline: Argentine provincial transfers up 17 pct in April.

text.p: Argentina's central government transferred $1.32 billion to the provinces in April, a 17 percent increase from the same month a year earlier, the Economy Ministry said Wednesday.
The rise in transfers was mainly attributed to a 20.8 percent increase in tax collections, said the ministry.
Under the laws governing the transfers, the government distributes a set percentage of value added and income tax collections to the provinces.
